one it says press a to start and thats kinda hard cause your wearing a oculus two when i pressed it it still didnt start and thats really dumb

review_title: Dont even bother playing -0 stars for me
one_reviews_text: the holding of the gun is wrong in the first place, you can't reload it after you complete the afwul tutorial there is this dog that goes ahead and lies on the ground right on the spot you need to get to this is just a horrible game 0 out of 5 for me...
This game is the worst game ive ever played it is s unbeatable and stupid i hope you die in a hole game.

okay the music is loud, i cant reload the sniper, the dog in the hidout blocks me from doing stuff, when i hold the sniper with my left hand my right hand just dissapears, bolt action is semi-auto, scope is really bad. if i could i would give 0 stars. please dont install this game and i mean this from the bottom of my heart dont buy with money. (forgot to mention the awful controls).

review_title: The devs has never shot or own a firearm
one_reviews_text:
I know that this is a bit controversal, but this isn't how a firearm actually work. They had made bolt action rifles as semi auto (which it is quite obvious to those who actually fired a gun in their lives). And I am going to assume that the semiauto rifles acting like bolt action as well. The scope is fine, same with the shooting mechanics. But the animation for bolt action sniper rifles and semi auto sniper rifles being mixed up needs to be fixed. Although having mag appear out of nowhere makes it more of an arcade like experience. It would've been better if you had mags on the chest of the player and for the player to grab it instead would make the experience much better.

I am not saying this to insult the devs, but the devs should've realized the rifles were switched and need to correct every rifle from the starting to the end. And yes, this is my impression of a demo.

Although the other reviews about how to zoom the scope and to reload is already been hinted, (x is to summon the clip) and left analogue stick for the scope zoom.
The charging handle is bugged
Mechanics are insane. Bolts rifles are semi auto, semi auto rifles have bolts...? The bolt is a charging handle? wtf

Overall, the game looked like it could be an ok introduction to VR FPS games. In the end, the training level wouldnt let me reload, though it would let me do everything else, the scope was inconsistent with it's visuals, and the overall performance was underwhelming. I owned the game for only about 5 minutes and was already fed up with the mechanics. In a nutshell, it was not an enjoyable experience.

The game seemed like fun but, the scope is so hard to use and I could bearly aim with it!! my aim in other games is prettey good with the oculus but in this game I could hardly aim with the scope and I would of just not used the scope but the enemys are TOO far away for that, im good at aiming on the oculus but not that good!
Need more guns in the game, so that combat will not look feel stagnant. Looking forward to buying a full version of the game too, hope it has new guns, and many other useful things.

This game needs little bit of tweaks through which the game can be better to play in VR. 1) The distance between enemy, and player should be less. 2) Add story of the game through static cutscenes 3) Need more gloves skin. The game play looks good, but needs more graphical improvements. Because of game play I give 4 stars otherwise it is a must to have game.

Hello, I am an owner of a restaurant, with gaming theme where people can come and enjoy gaming with delicious dinner. I have 2 VR devices with me 1)Oculus, and 2) HTC vive. In Oculus the game looks so, good and runs very smooth, but in HTC vive the game runs smooth, but the graphical details are low compared to Oculus. Please fix this issue, and your game is good to go.
Had a blast playing this game.  Lots and lots to explore in this game. May be you could add many more things in the game to make it lot more exciting. Looking forward to more updates of the game.
Just not there yet.  Keep trying.

A must try title for the VR game lovers. This game literally gives you an experience that you  are on a mission to take out bad guys, in a city with your precise sniper rifle. Loved the environment setup of the game, and cool gun finishes available in the game.
The Game has improved a lot after the update. Must appreciate developer's work towards the game. Hope later updates makes game more exciting
Game never starts, just crashes,, other reviews ssay this game sucks,,I belive it
This can be a game which defines this sniper genere on  this platform. A perfect blend of nice gameplay, and eye catching environment. VR lovers must give it a shot.
Amazing shooting game, good graphics and sounds, Very immersive and feels real. Dual wielding lots of weapons at your disposal. Many levels. I've been playing this with my gf, she likes this also.

Environment setup in the game is decent, but I am actually impressed by the implementation of sniper mechanics in the game, it is done in an accurate manner which gives player a great sniping experience.

Story of the game is still unclear, as it is not shown properly in the game. But for gameplay I can rate this game 4 stars as it is balanced pretty good, and each sniper rifle has its own unique perk.
well made , Priced Reasonably and shooting weapon system are well done. this is one of my favorite shooting range style games all the other ones i own. I hope the developer continues adding to this .
Perfect combination of music and environment, the game play is quite immersive with a perfect background score while we take down the enemies. and ya, the game is awesome.

If I review the gameplay of the game, than it is really good and is worth 5 star. But the disappointing part of the game, is that we still have to complete achievements, to unlock skins of the guns and gloves in game after I have paid for this game.
Could not expect more than this for any other game of sniper genre, its a complete package of VR sniping experience.
Impressive Game, and nice gun skins though. Adding to it, love the setup of the hideout, but changing skins of the dog is little disappointing as pressing the button changes its skin.
Needs a graphical improvement. If the art of a game is improved, this can be a big thing on VR platform.
After playing the demo of a game, I am excited to get full version of the game as early as possible.
Love the sound setup of the game, as it literally gives me the feeling that I am currently present in the game, and leaving it
Still needs an improvements on art side of the game, as it looks little blurry, But a good game to tell on a VR platform.
Please add more levels, like helicopter level, so we can experience flying in the sky with the fun of sniping the enemies
Overall the game is good but as targets are far away it becomes little blurry, please fix that and the game is good to go.
Game is way better after an update. Especially the cosmetics that is added in the game.
I see there is a lot of potential in this game, and its concept on this platform. But still developers can work hard on it, and make a better product out of it.
Has greatly improved since the update. Keep it up.
The Best Sniper Rust Game in VR

I was so hyped there was a cool VR Sniper game finally, however in this game, you are literally standing out in the open! No sniper would ever do that! You die relentlessly before being able to pass any mission. It's aggravating more than entertaining. I wouldn't even mind it being hard, just at least give us cover, and the ability to move. You can walk in the main menu, but not in the game! Makes no sense. This game had me so excited and left me rather annoyed that the developers missed the very very very tiny detail that snipers don't stand out in the middle of a battlefield where 20 people and helicopters can see them and shoot them. Not even a challenge or "hard", but moreso a senseless frustration.

Will gladly give this game a second chance, as I believe a VR Sniper game can be a big hit. The controls, graphics, and gameplay are amazing, I will give it that. Just the fundamentals of the game need to be fixed before I would ever purchase. Keep it up, don't give up, and listen to your fans.
Was looking for some casual sniping experience and go what asked for. Can improve in some sections with a few tweaks especially in mission variety but still worth a shot.
I have played the previous version of the game too but after the latest update, the game has improved in  a lot of aspects. Worth giving a shot.

Would not even start i love shooting games but whoever made this does have to fix this game , i know it used to be 10 dollars but this is about as bad as vr zombie game that got one star. And i would not pay one cent for this game.
I have tried to install the demo twice and still it will not load.  No way I am buying a game that the demowill not even load to bad it looks like a cool game

I can't launch the game, instant crash.
I can test this demo.
Can't seem to get it to play (trial version), can't seem to find easy web-help yet on the topic.   I love that a free trail is offered, of course....thus the extra star.
wont load
does not start at all
doesnt start
this is a good app.

There are just so many things wrong with this I don't know where to begin.. very unintuitive controls, you have to read every instructions displayed instead of depending on your natural human instinct, it makes the game very frustrating
 just to figure out the controls. Sometimes the grab button is "A" and sometimes it's "X" and sometimes you pull the trigger to grab an item.
 Movements are either restricted or super sensitive using the old school nausea way of navigating. The game is hard to play and it takes away any fun or joy you might expect from playing a game. You are a sniper yet you stand openly still in an open area with 3 or 4 people shooting at you. This feels like an incomplete demo back in the DK2 era. But instead of giving this a straight 1-star review I must give credit to some of the good points. The concept is good and the graphics are great. The game does look promising but for now it's just unplayable. I hope the developers would continue to work on it. Perhaps update the controls and focus on making it fun rather than challenging. And get rid of that irritating background music loop!
​
Snipers do not stand that close to their targets, and definitely don't stand in no cover while being shot at

Finally a decent Sniper game on Oculus. Was waiting eagerly for something like this and after playing this demo version, I would definately love to give its full version a try. In general I do not like writting reviews on the games, but this game looks to hold some potential in it. Need to wait for the full version to see how it delivers.

review_title: So much better than the previous one !
one_reviews_text: I played the previous demo version of this game, and it needed a lot of work. I think developers have carefully looked into the reviewes and have made some serious changes in the game. The game is way better then the previous version of the game. Hats off to the development team to change this game drastically.

One thing's for sure, that this was definetly above my expectations! I thought it would be a simple sniper game like some I played on vive, but no, a single challenge in the demo level give me the feeling that there will be more exciting challenges in full version of the game that is going to make this game more addictive. In a nutshell, Worth Playing.
Get to the first screen, says pick up weapon with grab button.  Shows button being push and hand grabbing but will not pick up the rifle.  Stuck
review_feedback: Both touch controllers should work properly and should remain active during the game to use any function ingame.

one_reviews_text: buttons dont respond locks up . theres nothing wrong with myy controlers its your game that doesnt work im sorry but this is not the only game that didnt work on oculas  if you dont want honest reviews dont ask for a  review
review_feedback: All the games uploaded on Oculus Store go through technical review first. If the game actually didn't work it would have never passed in the first place. So please check your controllers before giving the review.

one_reviews_text: nice i can trick shot very easy

Please learn the proper function of any firearm you decide to add to the game. Learn its mechanics, how to operate it, how many rounds each magazine holds... start from there, then work your way up to gameplay.
A short review: Demo version is good amd it will create an eagerness in the player to play full version of the game, as soon as it will be out in the store.

Gun feels OK. 

But what kind of genius sniper stands in open space and just start shooting? Can't even move around? No, thank you.
review_feedback: The game description reads that it only supports Sitting-only mode. Movement is not intended during combat as the gunplay requires every button the touch controllers support and might even cause dizziness to a lot of people.

one_reviews_text: Graphics ingame looks quite good for a vr title.  And the hideout approach for accepting missions is also very well done. Looking forward for the full version. Would have been good if they would have mentioned when they are going to release it.

Overall it is a good game, with good gameplay experience but I would like to give 4 stars only, as there are no cutscenes for story telling ingame. Hope developers stop by these review and try to implement some kind of story ingame.

This game has so much potential but there are a few things wrong 1 why am i standing in the middle of an open area being shot at if im a sniper 2 why cant i duck and 3 WHY FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DOES THE GUN SHAKE I Cant look down the sight with out taking a knee and using a flat surface to use the gun. I hunt and never once have i looked down the sight and the gun start shaking its disorienting

The physics in the game are incomplete, the and the textures are unfinished. The first mission should have a river of sorts, its just an empty river bed with some modles of fish "swimming" in it (they're stationary, but the animation sugests they should be swimming). I got terrible motion sickness from moving around. And, despite being a sniper, there is no stealth involved. You stand in the open being shot at by enimes
Perfect combination of music and environment, the gameplay is quite immersive with a perfect background score while we take down the enemies.  And ya, the dog is awesome....
Great in-game mechanics. The mission is also well defined which makes it game challenging as well as fun. Love the hideout process of accepting the mission.

review_title: Can work on movement a bit
one_reviews_text: The game is good and definitely worth playing but would have been better if the player would be able to move to a certain range (atleast horizontally upto certain limits) or take cover.
The game is good but the art of the game is not upto the mark of the current era of games, but yes the gameplay is good. Must try this game atleast once for its challenging gameplay.

Do NOT waste your time. Doesn't work. You can't even reload. The game is broken. Don't understand why developers waste their time and ours with games that don't even do basci things even half way correct.
review_feedback: All the games uploaded on Oculus Store go through technical review first. If the game actually didn't work it would have never passed in the first place. Take your time to go through the tutorial first and understand how it actually works before stating the game is broken.

one_reviews_text: Scope of the gun needs a bit of rework, Developers please look into it. Nevertheless the game is worth giving a shot.
Waiting for full version. Looks promising.
ALL FRONG GUYS, ALL WRONG. the onty decent thing is the scope
review_feedback: As already stated a few times before, all the games uploaded on Oculus Store go through technical review first. If the game actually didn't work it would have never passed in the first place. If you have any other ideas to improve gameplay please suggest.
